page.title: 18Travelling - Teithio.
page.content: The roads around our area,although classed as'A' roads are quite narrow with many bends.Often large vehicles have to slow down or even stop in order to pass.In winter, the roads are very quiet but there is a marked difference in summer because of tourists.Because public transport does not offer a frequent service, local people have to rely on private cars. The bus service offers 6 buses a day - 3in each direction.The trains run more frequently with 9 trains running each way but this service even does not satisfy all our needs. Few people generally travel on bikes or on public transport.Most people who go shopping or travel to work rely on cars. The 1981 census showed that 27% of households in the village were with out cars.
